file.name: positive2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        '200':
          schema:
            allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                id:
                  type: string
                name:
                  type: string
              additionalProperties: 'true'
            - type: string
components:
  schemas:
    MyObject:
      oneOf:
      - type: object
        properties:
          id:
            type: string
          name:
            type: string
        additionalProperties: 'false'
      - type: string
        additionalProperties: 'false'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!str `false` into bool; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!str `false` into bool
